profile.name: John Doe
profile.bio: I'm a creative developer & designer with a passion for creating user-centered digital solutions. In my free time, I enjoy exploring new design trends, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying a good cup of coffee while sketching new ideas.
profile.bioHobbies: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new design trends, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying a good cup of coffee while sketching new ideas.
